remarks:
Referring to spaces containing water closet. Space may be indicated at cubicle level.

AmbulantDisabled [Boolean] - To indicate true for ambulant disabled washroom/ toilets and cubicles

SCDF's private lift lobby refers to lobby that are located within the residential unit PG 2. This is not a common space.

All needs to be indicated with or without commercial activities to be assigned the correct OL factor.
If these is commercial activity, the path must be indicated as elevated or underground pedestrain linkway. Any other terms eg walkway, footpath, pathway cannot be used as they are all 0m2/pax.
